name: Polaris Styles
description:
This library provides all the core styles needed when designing with Polaris. This includes color styles, type styles, and shadow/elevation definitions. All these styles are mapped to the design tokens that power styles within Polaris and the Shopify admin.

 

Full documentation: polaris.shopify.com

Github repo: github.com/shopify/polaris

 

What's new:

  • Styles were previously broken out into separate files. They are now all defined within a single file making it easier to both consume.
